entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
